column1: nkhono mathabo oitse hosasa feela retlasila
hleso uatseba keseketseba hobula kantle ka mona
ke pompong etswanang le yaka ke ena
kathola ka pensele ka tlung ka mona
phooa khathe ke lekhapetla la la tsa
butle tsebo kesabona na eangola uautlwa
tsebo sheba pompong yaka ka tlasa
orobetse ashebisitse letsoho kwana aleshebisitse kwana
thola tsebo reutlwe hore na ntho ena entseella
